translated: Elder Story🔽The Chapter about the Worshipper of the Fire-God
in the world of the best Buddha,
the appearance of the Great Seer.
but I did not see that Victor;
I remembered the perception of the Buddha.
I do not know of a bad destination,
this is the fruit of worshipping the Buddha.

original: kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ”.🔽Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā saddasaññako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.

translated: I have done what the Buddha asked.”🔽Thus the Elder Saddha-Sanñaka recited these verses.
